T02D3717:183a-1: ma h'a y'a na pa tha kra ma /
T02D3717:183a-3: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi rim pa /
T02D3717:183a-4: dpal 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3717:183a-5: dpal ldan mgon po kun rang bzhin //
T02D3717:183a-6: rnam snang mjad la phyag 'tshal te //
T02D3717:183a-7: skal chen dang ldan dga' ba'i phyir //
T02D3717:183a-8: thag chen lam rim bshad par bya //
T02D3717:183a-9: gang zhig mi khom gnas spangs te //
T02D3717:183a-10: chos spyod skal ba ldan pa'i tshe //
T02D3717:183a-11: bdag nyid brtson par mi byed pa //
T02D3717:183a-12: 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen cing //
T02D3717:183a-13: bzhin gyur mdangs yal bkrag bor tshe //
T02D3717:183b-0: 'tsho ba phra mo'i @183b ched dag tu //
T02D3717:183b-1: sdug bsngal chen po bzod gyur na //
T02D3717:183b-2: sdug bsngal kun dang bral 'dod pas //
T02D3717:183b-3: bzong pa chen po cis mi bsten //
T02D3717:183b-5: theg chen lam la brtson pa dang //
T02D3717:183b-6: dge pa'i bshegs la bsnyen bkur zhes //
T02D3717:183b-7: bdag ni khyed la de skad gdams //
T02D3717:183b-8: lnga brgya tha ma'i dus kyi tshe //
T02D3717:183b-9: snyigs ma lnga yi sems can rnams //
T02D3717:183b-10: theg chen skal ldan ngo mtshar che //
T02D3717:183b-11: de bas spro ba chen po bskyed //
T02D3717:183b-12: de la theg chen rnam gnyis te //
T02D3717:183b-13: pha rol phyin sogs theg chen dang //
T02D3717:183b-14: theg pa chen po gsang sngags te //
T02D3717:183b-15: de don bsdus rgyas shin tu rgyas //
T02D3717:183b-16: ngo bo la sogs brjod par bya //
T02D3717:183b-17: dad sogs bcas rnams mnyan par gyis //
T02D3717:183b-18: gang zhig pha rol phyin 'dod pa //
T02D3717:183b-19: cho ga lnga yi rim pa yis //
T02D3717:183b-20: lam rnams la ni bgrod bya ste //
T02D3717:183b-21: pha rol phyin sogs ldan par ro //
T02D3717:183b-22: sems bskyed sdom pa nod pa dang //
T02D3717:183b-23: de bsrung mtshan nyid shes bya dang //
T02D3717:183b-24: sems bskyed spyod pa dag pa ste //
T02D3717:183b-26: bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'o //
T02D3717:183b-27: da ni de nyid rgyas par bstan par bya ste /
T02D3717:183b-28: de yang dang po rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis /
T02D3717:183b-29: yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la /
T02D3717:183b-30: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par bya zhing sngom pa nod par bya'o //
T02D3717:183b-31: de nas de mi nyams par bsrung ba la 'bad par bya'o //
T02D3717:183b-32: de ltar snod du rung ba dang thos pa'i shes
T02D3717:183b-33: rab kyis theg pa chen po shes rab kyi pha
T02D3717:183b-34: rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa mnyan nas /
T02D3717:183b-38: spangs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T02D3717:183b-39: de nas sems bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3717:183b-40: de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D3717:183b-41: de la yan lag lnga ni /
T02D3717:183b-42: lam dang lam gyi grogs rgyud la bskyed pa dang /
T02D3717:183b-47: de la lam ni tshogs kyi lam dang /
T02D3717:183b-51: lam gyi yan lag ni zhi gnas dang /
T02D3717:183b-52: lhag mthong rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D3717:183b-54: dmigs pa'i yul rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D3717:183b-55: spang bar bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D3717:184a-1: ba'i thabs ni lam gyi rim pa bzhin du bya ste /
T02D3717:184a-2: spyang bya chen po gnyen po chung dus spang la /
T02D3717:184a-3: spang bya chung du gnyen pos spong ba'o //
T02D3717:184a-4: spangs pa las 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis 'byung ngo //
T02D3717:184a-5: spyod pa dag par bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:184a-6: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i gnas skabs dang /
T02D3717:184a-7: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs so //
T02D3717:184a-8: de ltar rgyas par bstan nas shin tu rgyas par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3717:184a-9: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i ngo bo la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D3717:184a-10: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i yul ni gzhan gyi don no //
T02D3717:184a-11: ngo bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o //
T02D3717:184a-12: dbye ba ni rgyas par dbye na nyi shu dang gnyis so //
T02D3717:184a-14: shin tu bsdu na rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D3717:184a-15: de la nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni chos thams cad mngon par byang chub 'dod pas /
T02D3717:184a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa'i mtshan
T02D3717:184a-18: nyid de dus thams cad du mi 'gyur bar 'dod
T02D3717:184a-19: pas na bsam pa gser lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184a-20: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa de dag 'phel par 'dod pas /
T02D3717:184a-21: lhag pa'i bsam pa zla ba tshes pa lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184a-22: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mi'i khyad par
T02D3717:184a-23: dang 'dra ba rtogs pas sbyor pa me lta bu
T02D3717:184a-24: dang / sems can tshad med pa'i rgyud tshim par
T02D3717:184a-25: mdzad pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gter
T02D3717:184a-26: dang / lta bu dang / yon tan rin po
T02D3717:184a-27: che rnams de las 'byung pas na tshul khrims kyi
T02D3717:184a-28: pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas
T02D3717:184a-29: dang / lta bu dang / lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184a-30: mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma thams cad kyis mi bskyod
T02D3717:184a-31: pas na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya
T02D3717:184a-32: mtsho chen po lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184a-33: yang dag pa'i shes pa la brten pa mi phyed
T02D3717:184a-34: pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D3717:184a-36: dmigs pa thams cad kyi rnam par g-yeng bas bsgul
T02D3717:184a-37: bar mi nus pas na bsam gtan gyi pha rol
T02D3717:184a-38: tu phyin pa ri bo lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184a-39: sgrib pa gnyis kyi nad rab tu zhi bar mdzad
T02D3717:184a-40: pas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D3717:184a-42: gnas skabs thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi
T02D3717:184a-43: don yongs su mi spong bas thabs kyi pha rol
T02D3717:184a-44: tu phyin pa bla ma lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184a-45: smon lam ji lta bu'i 'bras bus don mdzad pas
T02D3717:184a-46: na smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid
T02D3717:184b-0: bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu @184b dang ;
T02D3717:184b-1: gdul bya'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par byed
T02D3717:184b-2: pas na stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi
T02D3717:184b-4: gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi yid dga' bar byed
T02D3717:184b-5: pa'i chos ston pas na ye shes kyi pha rol
T02D3717:184b-6: tu phyin pa dbyangs snyan pa lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184b-7: mthu thogs pa med pa'i mngon par shes pa dang lhan cig par rtogs pa ni //
T02D3717:184b-8: gzhan gyi don lhur mdzad pas na rgyal po chen po lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184b-9: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lhan cig par rtogs pa ni /
T02D3717:184b-11: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang lhan cig par rtogs pa ni /
T02D3717:184b-12: 'phags pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing bzhud pas lam chen po lta bu dang //
T02D3717:184b-13: zhi gnas dang lhag ma thong dang lhan cig par rtogs pa ni //
T02D3717:184b-14: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung
T02D3717:184b-15: bar bde blag tu 'gro bas bzhon pa lta bu
T02D3717:184b-16: dang // gzings dang spobs pa dang lhan cig bar rtogs pa ni /
T02D3717:184b-17: bstan pa mtha' yas pa 'dzin cing mi zad pas bkod ma lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184b-18: chos kyi dbyings dang lhan cig par rtogs pa ni /
T02D3717:184b-19: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis thos na dga' ba yin pas sgra brnyan lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184b-20: bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang lhan cig bar rtogs pa ni /
T02D3717:184b-21: thams cad kyi rgyu gcig bu yin pa'i phyir /
T02D3717:184b-22: rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i phyir chu bo'i rgyun lta bu dang /
T02D3717:184b-23: chos kyi sku dang lhan cig par rtogs pa ni //
T02D3717:184b-24: don gyi bya ba thams cad de la rig las pas sprin lta bu'o //
T02D3717:184b-25: de ltar nyi shu rtsa gcig po de nyid bzhir bsdu ste /
T02D3717:184b-26: de yang 'dun pa la sogs pa gsum ni /
T02D3717:184b-27: las dang po pa'i gnas skabs te /
T02D3717:184b-29: sbyor ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i gnas skabs so //
T02D3717:184b-30: sbyin pa la sogs pa bcu ni rgyu'i gnas skabs so //
T02D3717:184b-31: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa brgyad kyis ni 'bras bu ste /
T02D3717:184b-32: de yang dang po lnga ni khyad par gyi lam mo //
T02D3717:184b-33: 'og ma gsum ni sbyor ba dang /
T02D3717:184b-34: dngos dang mjug gi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sas bsdus pa ste /
T02D3717:184b-35: sems gang gis dang po'i las la mngon par sbyor ba dang /
T02D3717:184b-36: gang gi las rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T02D3717:184b-37: las rdzogs par byas pa las legs par byas pas
T02D3717:184b-38: so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang go rims
T02D3717:184b-39: bzhin no // de dag nyid g yis su bsdus te //
T02D3717:185a-1: po gsum ni sm0on pa'i sems so //
T02D3717:185a-2: lhag ma bcu dgu ni 'jhig pa'i sems te //
T02D3717:185a-3: de la sm0on pa ni don du gnyer pa'i rgyu ste //
T02D3717:185a-4: des na 'dir gzhan gyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas
T02D3717:185a-5: su 'grub par gyur cig ces gsol pa 'debs pa
T02D3717:185a-6: ni smon pa'o // 'jug pa'i sems ni sdom pa

T02D3717:185a-8: pa nyams su len pa ni 'jug pa'i don yin
T02D3717:185a-9: ni smon pa'o // no // de la sdom pa'i sems pa ste /
T02D3717:185a-10: lnga kun du 'gro ba'i sems pa nyid do //
T02D3717:185a-11: de'i mtshan nyid ni bstan du med pa thogs pa med pa'o //
T02D3717:185a-12: dbye ba ni thun mong ste /
T02D3717:185a-13: srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D3717:185a-14: thun mong ma yin pa ste /
T02D3717:185a-15: gnod sems la sogs pa spong zhing gzhan gyi don la 'bad pa la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02D3717:185a-16: sdom pa'i sems ba des lus ngag yid gsum bya
T02D3717:185a-17: ba ma yin pa'i las la mi 'jug pas sdom
T02D3717:185a-18: pa'o // sems bskyed cing sdom pa mnod pa yang /
T02D3717:185a-19: bla ma byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /
T02D3717:185a-20: sdom pa la gnas pa mkhas pa nus pa dang ldan pa las blang ngo //
T02D3717:185a-21: de med na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid kyis dmigs la blang bar bya'o //
T02D3717:185a-22: sems bskyed cing sdom ba nod pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D3717:185a-23: de nas bsrung bar bya ste srog gi phyir yang sdom pa nyams par mi bya ste /
T02D3717:185a-24: bdag nyid shi ba ni bla'i tshe rabs thams cad
T02D3717:185a-25: du sha bsags na ni ri rab bas che la
T02D3717:185a-26: / khrag bsags na ni rgya mtsho bas mang zhing /
T02D3717:185a-27: rus bsags par gyur na ni rtsi shing bas mang zhing /
T02D3717:185a-28: don med par 'khyams nas tshe 'di'i bar du mi gtsang ba'i phung po sna tshogs pa blangs shing /
T02D3717:185a-29: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po yang dang yang du nyams su myong par gyur pas //
T02D3717:185a-30: sdom pa ni nyams par mi bya'o //
T02D3717:185a-31: sdom pa yang ji ltar bla ma las blangs pa bzhin du bsrung ba la 'bad par bya'o //
T02D3717:185a-32: de mi nyams par bsrung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D3717:185a-33: de ltar theg pa chen po'i snod du rung ba de theg pa chen po'i gdams ngag mnyan nas /
T02D3717:185a-34: theg pa thun mong gi chos dang /
T02D3717:185a-35: thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi spang bya la
T02D3717:185a-36: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad shes par bya ste
T02D3717:185a-37: / mtshan nyid ma shes par ni bsgrub par mi nus te /
T02D3717:185a-38: dmus long gis mar la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D3717:185b-0: de bas na thos pa'i shes rab @185b sngon du song bas mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T02D3717:185b-1: mtshan nyid yongs su shes par bya ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D3717:185b-2: de ltar snong du rung zhing mtshan nyid shes par
T02D3717:185b-3: byas pa des sems sbyang ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin
T02D3717:185b-5: thos ba tsam gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3717:185b-6: de bas na bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis sems sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D3717:185b-7: de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga ste /
T02D3717:185b-8: rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag gis lam rgyud la bskyed pa dang /
T02D3717:185b-13: lam rgyud la bskyed pa la yang lam gyi grogs zhig nas dang //
T02D3717:185b-14: lhag mthong la bslab pa dang //
T02D3717:185b-15: de nas lam dngos te thabs dang shes rab la bslab pa'o //
T02D3717:185b-16: de la zhi gnas ni dngos po gang yang rung ba cig la nges par bya ste /
T02D3717:185b-17: sems kyi rgyun gyi skad cig ma de nyid du yang dang yang gtad par bya'o //
T02D3717:185b-18: gang gi yul de la sems gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe /
T02D3717:185b-19: zhi gnas rdzogs pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D3717:185b-20: lhag mthong ni zhi gnas kyi 'bras bu yin te /
T02D3717:185b-21: don de nyid la dpyod pa'o //
T02D3717:185b-22: lhag mthong gi 'bras bu ni zung du 'brel ba ste /
T02D3717:185b-23: yul gang la yang mi gnas pas yul de nyid bye brag tu mthong la /
T02D3717:185b-24: de nyid kyi tshe sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas
T02D3717:185b-25: dmigs pa du ma la rgyug pa rab tu zhi
T02D3717:185b-26: bar gnas pa'o // gal te rnal 'byor pa de
T02D3717:185b-27: 'dod chags la sogs pas sems g-yeng bar gyur na
T02D3717:185b-28: 'dod chags kyi gnyen por ni mi sdug pa ste
T02D3717:185b-29: bar gnas pa'o // / mi gtsang ba la sogs pa sgom pa'o //
T02D3717:185b-30: de bzhin du zhe sdang gi gnyen por ni byams pa'o //
T02D3717:185b-31: gti mug gi gnyen por ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o //
T02D3717:185b-32: nga rgyal gyi gnyen por ni khams kyi rab tu dbye ba'o /
T02D3717:185b-33: khying ba'i gnyen por snang ba'i 'du shes dang /
T02D3717:185b-34: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i yon tan yid la byed pa'o //
T02D3717:185b-35: rgod pa'i gnyen por ni mi rtag pa yid la
T02D3717:185b-36: byed pas sngon dgod pa dang rtse zhing dga' ba
T02D3717:185b-37: rjes su dran ba de yang zhi bar bya'o //
T02D3717:185b-38: sems der mi dga' bar gyur pa'i tshe ni mi
T02D3717:185b-39: dga' ba'i skyon bsam zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi yon
T02D3717:185b-40: tan la bsams pas de yang zhi bar bya'o //
T02D3717:185b-41: bying rgod la sogs pa dang bral nas sems cha mnyam par 'jug cing gnas par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D3717:186a-2: sems mnyam par 'jug pa la bsgrims par byas na g-yeng bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3717:186a-3: de ltar zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la slob pa'i
T02D3717:186a-4: gang zag des gong nas gong du gyur pa'i las
T02D3717:186a-5: ni mtshan ma med pa'i zhi gnas so sor rtog
T02D3717:186a-6: pa'i shes rab las mtshan ma med pa'i lhag mthong
T02D3717:186a-7: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur
T02D3717:186a-8: ro // de yang lam dngos te thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas so //
T02D3717:186a-9: bsgom pa yang rnam par dbye bas lnga ste /
T02D3717:186a-13: sgom pa'i lam sa gnyis pa nas bdun pa dang /
T02D3717:186a-14: brgyad pa nas bcu pa ste /
T02D3717:186a-15: mos pas spyod pa'i sa gsum mo //
T02D3717:186a-16: 'dir mos pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
T02D3717:186a-17: bdag dang gzhan gyi don la mos pa dang /
T02D3717:186a-18: brtson pa che thang du byed pas mos pa ste /
T02D3717:186a-19: sbyor ba'i lam ni ma yin par dgongs so //
T02D3717:186a-21: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te //
T02D3717:186a-22: de la thabs ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan rnams dang /
T02D3717:186a-24: dge ba'i chos thams cad do //
T02D3717:186a-25: shes rab ni thabs de phyin ci ma log par byed pa ste /
T02D3717:186a-26: chos thams cad skye ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin shes pa'o //
T02D3717:186a-27: de la tshogs kyi lam thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i skabs su /
T02D3717:186a-28: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D3717:186a-29: de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
T02D3717:186a-30: sems dang chos dran pa nye par gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa ste /
T02D3717:186a-31: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02D3717:186a-32: mi dge ba'i chos thams cad skyes pa med par byas pa dang /
T02D3717:186a-33: ma skyes pa mi skyed pa dang /
T02D3717:186a-34: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed par bya ba dang /
T02D3717:186a-35: skyes pa rnams 'phel bar bya ste /
T02D3717:186a-36: yang dag par spongs ba bzhi dang /
T02D3717:186a-37: 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
T02D3717:186a-39: sems dang dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du
T02D3717:186a-40: byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
T02D3717:186a-41: bsgom par bya'o // de nas sbyor ba'i lam nges par 'byed pa'i skabs su dbang po lnga dang /
T02D3717:186a-43: de yang drod dang rtse mo'i dus su dad pa dang /
T02D3717:186b-0: shes rab @186b kyi dbang po ste lnga'o //
T02D3717:186b-2: chos kyi mchog gi dus su dad pa la sogs
T02D3717:186b-3: pa de nyid stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba la
T02D3717:186b-5: dad pa'i stobs la sogs pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3717:186b-6: de'i 'og tu mthong ba'i lam ste /
T02D3717:186b-7: byang chub kyi yan lag gis phye ba'o //
T02D3717:186b-8: de yang dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T02D3717:186b-9: de bzhin du chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T02D3717:186b-14: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste /
T02D3717:186b-15: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /
T02D3717:186b-19: bden pa rnam pa bzhi chos bcu drug tu dmigs
T02D3717:186b-20: pa med par bsgoms pas shes bzod bcu drug tu
T02D3717:186b-21: rtogs nas mtheng ba'i lam thob ba'o //

T02D3717:190a-26: dang / dngos grub myang zhing lha la sogs pa
T02D3717:190a-27: khyad par du bya ba'i phyir rab gnas kyi cho
T02D3717:190a-28: dang / ga dang / bsod nams khyad par can bsags pa'i phyir tsha tsha'i cho ga dang /
T02D3717:190a-30: dbang bskur ba'i phyir bum pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D3717:190a-31: nye ba'i grogs kyang lnga ste /
T02D3717:190a-34: mtshan dang ldan pa'i grogs dang /
T02D3717:190a-35: gzhung dang mthun pa'i rdzas dang /
T02D3717:190a-36: chos dang mthun pa'i 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang lnga'o //
T02D3717:190a-41: yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:190a-44: de la 'jug pa'i yul ni pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun no //
T02D3717:190a-45: dmigs pa'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:190a-46: yi ge la sogs pa mtshan ma can dang /
T02D3717:190a-48: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis dmigs pa'o //
T02D3717:190a-49: spang bar bya ba ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:190a-52: spang ba'i thabs ni ngan rtog ni bzang rtog gis spong la /
T02D3717:190a-53: bzang rtog ni mi rtog pas spang bar bya'o //
T02D3717:190a-54: spangs pa'i 'bras bu ni gnyis te /
T02D3717:190b-1: de la thun mong ba ni mngon par shes pa la sogs so //
T02D3717:190b-2: thun mong ma yin pa la gnyis te /
T02D3717:190b-3: mthar thug ste sku gsum dang mthar thug ma yin pa ste /
T02D3717:190b-4: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ste /
T02D3717:190b-7: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dus su lha'i rnam par bya ba dang /
T02D3717:190b-9: lha'i rnam par bya ba la yang lhag pa'i lha'am /
T02D3717:190b-12: gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs par bya ba'o //
T02D3717:190b-13: gnas skabs su bya ba ni /
T02D3717:190b-14: khrus byas nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D3717:190b-17: yi dam bklags pa la sogs pa bya ba'o //
T02D3717:190b-18: de ltar rgyas par bshad nas shin tu rgyas par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D3717:190b-24: dbye ba la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D3717:190b-25: de yang dang por bla ma dam pa las sngom
T02D3717:190b-26: pa la sogs pa thob pa des bsrung ba la
T02D3717:190b-27: 'bad cing / gdams ngag mnyan par bya'o //
T02D3717:190b-28: de nas gnas yid du 'ong bar grogs chos dang mthun pa'am /
T02D3717:190b-29: bdag nyid gcig pu dus tshigs bzang po la 'dug la /
T02D3717:190b-33: yi dam bklag par yang bya'o //
T02D3717:190b-35: mandal byas la me tog bkram nas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3717:190b-36: de nas snying rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3717:190b-37: sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang bral bar 'dod pa'o //
T02D3717:190b-39: sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan par 'dod pa'o //
T02D3717:190b-41: bdag gis byang chub chen po thob par byas la /
T02D3717:190b-42: sems can gyi don bya'o zhes spro bar bya'o //
T02D3717:190b-44: de gsum mi dmigs par bsgom pa'o //
T02D3717:190b-45: de yang snying rje ni rtsa ba lta bu'o //
T02D3717:190b-46: byams pa ni sngong bu lta bu'o //
T02D3717:190b-47: dga' ba ni yal ga lta bu'o //
T02D3717:190b-48: tshogs gnyis ni lo ma lta bu'o //
T02D3717:190b-49: rnal 'byor gzhan rnams ni me tog lta bu'o //
T02D3717:190b-50: rnal 'byor pa rgyud yongs su smin pa ni 'bras bu lta bu ste /
T02D3717:190b-51: rtsa ba med par sdong bu la sogs pa mi
T02D3717:190b-52: 'byung ba dang 'dra bar snying rje med par byams
T02D3717:190b-53: pa la sogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02D3717:191a-1: bla ma sprul pa la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D3717:191a-3: de nas stong pa nyid kyi sngags brjod pa'i sgo
T02D3717:191a-4: nas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin mngon du bya
T02D3717:191a-5: ba ste / ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T02D3717:191a-6: de nas so so'i gzhung bzhin du bdag dam tshig sems dpar bskyed pa dang /
T02D3717:191a-7: mdun du dam tshig sems dpa' sprul pa dang /
T02D3717:191a-8: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D3717:191a-9: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02D3717:191a-14: spro bsdu la sogs pa la dmigs nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-15: skyo bar gyur na ngag gis bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-16: shin tu skyo bar gyur na lha mo la sogs
T02D3717:191a-17: pas mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas spyan drangs
T02D3717:191a-18: pa rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-19: sprul pa rnams ni bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-20: yang na bdag nyid lhar bskyed la 'khor gyi dkyil
T02D3717:191a-21: 'khor sprul nas mar me'i 'od gyes pa'i tshul du
T02D3717:191a-23: gcig dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bor snang la /
T02D3717:191a-24: gcig las kyi lhar byas la mchod pa la sogs pa de bzhin du thams cad bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-25: yang na bdag lhar byas nas ye shes dpa' spyan
T02D3717:191a-26: drang ba la sogs pa bdag nyid la byas la
T02D3717:191a-27: / bdag gi snying ga nas lha mo sprul pa'am /
T02D3717:191a-28: 'khor gyi lha mos bdag la mchod bstod byas nas /
T02D3717:191a-30: sku la bsdus la gong du bstan pa ltar bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-31: bzlas pa'i dus su thabs ni /
T02D3717:191a-32: mgal me bskor ba lta bu'am /
T02D3717:191a-35: thi gu bsgril ba lta bu'am /
T02D3717:191a-36: lcags sgrog sbrel ba lta bu bya ste /
T02D3717:191a-37: skabs kyi stobs kyis shes par bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-38: de ltar bsgoms pa las mtshan ma brtan po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3717:191a-39: mtshan ma thob nas mtshan ma med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-40: mtshan ma med pa mngon du gyur pa la ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub ces bya'o //
T02D3717:191a-41: de yan chad lam gyi thun mong ste gnyis su med do //
T02D3717:191a-43: don gyi rim pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas tshad med pa bsgoms pa dang /
T02D3717:191b-0: @191b thams cad la ma chags pa dang /
T02D3717:191b-1: snga phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D3717:191b-4: bsgoms pa'i shes rab mthar phyin pa rnams byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3717:191b-5: go rims bzhin du tshad med pa dang /
T02D3717:191b-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pas tshogs kyi lam dang /
T02D3717:191b-18: gzhan gyi don du gzugs rnam pa gnyis byung ba
T02D3717:191b-19: de nyid byin gyis brlabs nas rim pa bzhin du
T02D3717:191b-20: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D3717:191b-21: ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02D3717:191b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dub mdzad pa ni spro ba dang /
T02D3717:191b-32: byin gyis brlab par bstan to //
T02D3717:191b-35: dang por de bzhin gshegs pas bden pa gnyis lam bzhir bsgoms shing /
T02D3717:191b-36: tshogs bsags pas sku gsum thob pa de bzhin du /
T02D3717:191b-37: de ltar rnal 'byor pas thun gcig la bsgoms pas kyang tshul de bzhin du snang la /
T02D3717:191b-38: goms pa las phyis de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D3717:191b-39: de bas na thabs khyad par can 'bras bu lam du gyur pa zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:191b-41: da ni sngags la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D3717:191b-42: de la ngo bo ni thams cad kyi mthun par thabs dang shes rab gnyis so //
T02D3717:191b-43: gzhan du ni bden pa gnyis kyi ming can no //
T02D3717:191b-44: de la thabs ni kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du snang ba'o //
T02D3717:191b-45: shes rab ni don dam par skye ba med pa ste /
T02D3717:191b-46: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D3717:191b-47: gzhan dag gi ngo bo la sogs pa brjod pa ni /
T02D3717:191b-48: don gyi phyogs re tsam gzung ba ste /
T02D3717:191b-49: bdag gis ni khyab pa spyir btang ba'o //
T02D3717:191b-50: nges pa'i tshig ni skyob pa'i phyir na sngags te /
T02D3717:191b-51: yid skyob par byed pa'i don to //
T02D3717:191b-52: dbye na rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:192a-3: de la don dam pa'i sngags ni gnyis su med
T02D3717:192a-4: pa'i rang bzhin stong pa chen po'i ye shes dang
T02D3717:192a-5: / de yul du byed pa'i ye shes te /
T02D3717:192a-6: de nges par rtogs pas 'khor ba las skyob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3717:192a-7: de la ngo bo'i dbang du byas na dbye ba med do //
T02D3717:192a-8: yul can gyi dbang du dbye ba yod de /
T02D3717:192a-9: rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa'i dbye bas gzhag go //
T02D3717:192a-10: yul can gyi sgo nas dbye na de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:192a-14: bzod pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i gzungs dang /
T02D3717:192a-18: de la bzod pa'i gzungs ni /
T02D3717:192a-19: bskyed pa'i rim pa mthar phyin pa'i rnal 'byor pa'am /
T02D3717:192a-20: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'am /
T02D3717:192a-21: mtshan ma med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi skabs su yi
T02D3717:192a-22: ge aa la sogs pa de dag brjod bya dang
T02D3717:192a-23: / rjod byed rang bzhin med par sems so //
T02D3717:192a-24: de ltar des rang bzhin med pa de rtogs pa la ni dga' ba dang /
T02D3717:192a-25: mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te gzungs thob pa zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:192a-26: dran pa dang shes rab gcig tu byas pas bzod pa 'dzin par byed pas na gzungs zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:192a-27: gzungs thob pa des de ma thag tu phyag rgya
T02D3717:192a-28: chen po'i ye shes skye ba dang mthun pa'i bzod
T02D3717:192a-30: don dam pa'i chos rnams la bzod pas na bzod pa'o //
T02D3717:192a-31: bzod pa de skyes nas ring po mi thogs par
T02D3717:192a-32: phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro
T02D3717:192a-33: // de bas na gzungs de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'am /
T02D3717:192a-34: mtshan ma med pa bsgom pa'i skabs so //
T02D3717:192a-35: pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzung ltar na nges par 'byed pa'i skabs so //
T02D3717:192a-36: bskyed pa'i rim pa'am mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i rnal 'byor ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o //
T02D3717:192a-37: gzungs gsum ni phyag rgya chen po thob pa yan chad du 'thob pa'o //
T02D3717:192a-38: de yang phyag rgya chen po thob pa de yan chad des ting nge 'dzin dang /
T02D3717:192a-39: sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pas gsang sngags
T02D3717:192a-40: kyi tshig de dag gis sems can thams cad kyi
T02D3717:192a-41: nad la sogs pa med par gyur cig ces ting
T02D3717:192a-42: nge 'dzin gyi dbang gi stobs kyis sems can rnams
T02D3717:192b-0: kyi @192b yams kyi nad la sogs pa med cing
T02D3717:192b-1: byin gyis brlabs pa ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D3717:192b-2: de bas na ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang de ltar
T02D3717:192b-3: gyur pas gsang sngags rnams 'dzin par byed pas na
T02D3717:192b-4: gsang sngags kyi gzungs zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:192b-5: gsang zhes bya ba ni snod ma yin pa la thabs de gsang ba'i phyir ram /
T02D3717:192b-6: rtogs par dka' ba'i phyir gsang ba'o //
T02D3717:192b-7: chos kyi gzungs ni phyag rgya chen po thob pa'am /
T02D3717:192b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa'i ltar na sa dang po
T02D3717:192b-9: thob pa yan chad kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D3717:192b-10: sems dpa' 'am / mkha' 'gro ma la chos nyan
T02D3717:192b-11: pas sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i chos tshad
T02D3717:192b-12: med pa grangs med pa dpag tu med pa thos
T02D3717:192b-13: pa tsam gyis mi brjed par 'dzin pa'i dran pa
T02D3717:192b-14: sems dpa' 'am / dang / shes rab ni chos kyi gzungs zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:192b-15: don gyi gzungs ni de bzhin du gsungs pa'i chos
T02D3717:192b-16: de dag gi don gang dang gang yin pa de
T02D3717:192b-17: dag mi brjed par 'dzin pa'i dran pa dang shes
T02D3717:192b-18: rab ni don gyi gzungs so zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:192b-19: de la rig sngags ni stong pa chen po'i ye
T02D3717:192b-20: shes des yul du byas shing rtogs pas ma rig
T02D3717:192b-21: pa spong zhing rig pa skyed pa'i phyir rig sngags
T02D3717:192b-22: zhes bya'o // yang na stong pa chen po'i ye shes de nyid la gzungs zhes bya ste /
T02D3717:192b-23: gnod pa'i 'tshe ba thams cad nub pas na mi bzod pa med pas bzod pa dang /
T02D3717:192b-24: de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ma rtogs
T02D3717:192b-25: pa rtog pa can gyi yul ma yin pas gsang
T02D3717:192b-26: ba dang / tshig dang yi ge dang ming du
T02D3717:192b-27: brjod pa thams cad de rtogs pa las byung ba'i
T02D3717:192b-28: ba dang / phyir chos dang / bzod pa thams
T02D3717:192b-29: cad kyi don shes par bya ba'i don gyi ngo
T02D3717:192b-30: bo de yin pa'i phyir don zhes bya'o //
T02D3717:192b-31: gzungs ni 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ste /
T02D3717:192b-32: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das man chad nas /
T02D3717:192b-33: dmyal ba'i sems can yan chad kun des khyab cing 'dzin pas so //
T02D3717:192b-34: yang na dran pa dang shes rab gnyis kyis 'dzin cing mi brjed par bya bas na gzungs so //
T02D3717:192b-35: de bas na yul de ltar grub pas yul can la yang grub la /
T02D3717:192b-36: de rtogs pa'i thabs la yang grub pa de ston par byed pa'i tshig la grub ste /
T02D3717:192b-37: gcig gi ming gcig la btags pa'o //
T02D3717:192b-38: kun rdzob kyi sngags ni de thob pa'i thabs te /
T02D3717:192b-39: de yang sngags kyi gzungs dang /
T02D3717:193a-3: tshig la sogs pa thams cad do //
T02D3717:193a-4: rgyud ces bya ba ni 'brel ba'i phyir rgyud de /
T02D3717:193a-7: 'bras bu rnam pa gsum 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
T02D3717:193a-8: dbye ba rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:193a-12: don la rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D3717:193a-16: de la gzhi'i rgyud ni bden pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-17: thabs ni sgrub pa'i rim pa gnyis so //
T02D3717:193a-21: de bas na gzhi la brten nas thabs bsgoms //
T02D3717:193a-22: 'bras bu thob pas na 'brel pa'i phyir rgyud ces de la bya'o //
T02D3717:193a-23: bskyed pa ni zla ba la sogs pa bskyed pas na bskyed pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-25: rdzogs pa ni stong pa chen po'i ye shes te /
T02D3717:193a-26: de ni thabs la rdzogs par yod pa'am /
T02D3717:193a-27: yang na de rdzogs pas yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-29: ma chags par gtong bas ni gtor ma'o //
T02D3717:193a-30: rtog pa la sogs pa sreg cing gang 'dod pa'i don sbyin pas na sbyin sreg go //
T02D3717:193a-31: mchod pa'i yul du gyur pas na s'atstsha'o //
T02D3717:193a-32: khyad par du gyur pas na rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-33: yon tan thams cad 'dus pas na dgos pa byed pa'i phyir bum pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-34: dga' bar byed pas na mchod pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-35: yon tan brjod pas na bstod pa'o //
T02D3717:193a-39: sbyin sreg la yang gnyis te /
T02D3717:193a-40: don dam pa'i sbyin sreg mi rtog pa bsgom pa dang /
T02D3717:193a-41: kun rdzob kyi sbyin sreg go //
T02D3717:193a-42: de la rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:193a-44: nang gi ni kha thab khung du bsam pa la sogs pa de nyid do //
T02D3717:193a-45: phyi'i sbyin sreg la yang gnyis te /
T02D3717:193a-46: las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D3717:193a-47: las so so'i sbyin sreg go //
T02D3717:193a-48: so so'i sbyin sreg ni mos pa dang /
T02D3717:193a-50: las dang dbang du byas pas ci rigs su brtsi bar bya'o //
T02D3717:193a-51: s'atstsha yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D3717:193a-54: rab tu gnas pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D3717:193b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am rten rab gnas @193b bya ba dang /
T02D3717:193b-1: glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D3717:193b-2: rdo rje la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D3717:193b-4: gnas skabs su bya ba dang /
T02D3717:193b-5: dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa'i dus su bya ba'o //
T02D3717:193b-6: dkyil 'khor byed pa'i dus su ni bum pa gsum ste /
T02D3717:193b-10: spyir bum pa ni mang ste /
T02D3717:193b-13: gsang ba'i bum pa zhes rgyal po aindra bh'u ti la sogs pas bshad pas der shes par bya'o //
T02D3717:193b-15: mchod pa ni so so'i gzhung gis mi mthun te /
T02D3717:193b-16: 'on kyang rnam pa gsum du 'dus so //
T02D3717:193b-17: de yang dngos su bshams pa dang /
T02D3717:193b-18: yongs su gzung ba med pa dang /
T02D3717:193b-20: de ltar ngo bo la sogs pa bdag gis spyir khyab che bar brjod pa ni /
T02D3717:193b-21: bla ma'i man ngag bzung zhing rgyud thams cad dang mthun par bya ste /
T02D3717:193b-22: bdag gis rtogs pa tsam ni ma yin no //
T02D3717:193b-23: slob dpon gzhan dag gis gzhan du brjod pa ni don gyi phyogs re tsam blangs nas gsungs te /
T02D3717:193b-24: 'on kyang bdag gis bla ma'i man ngag brgyud nas
T02D3717:193b-25: brjod pa'i nang du 'dus pas 'gal ba med par
T02D3717:193b-26: shes par bya'o // de ltar skal ba dang ldan
T02D3717:193b-27: pa rnams kyis shes par byas la 'jug par bya'o
T02D3717:193b-28: shes par bya'o // // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D3717:193b-29: gang gzhig yul gzhan mthong 'dod pas //
T02D3717:193b-30: ma grol bar du mthong mi 'gyur //
T02D3717:193b-31: de bzhin nad rnams sel ba yang //
T02D3717:193b-32: sman sogs med par sel mi nus //
T02D3717:193b-33: de bzhin bdag gzhan don 'dod pas //
T02D3717:193b-34: dngos / de bas dngos grub gnyis la 'bad //
T02D3717:193b-35: de rgyu thabs ni rnam pa / de bas dngos grub gnyis la 'bad //
T02D3717:193b-36: de rgyu thabs ni rnam pa gnyis //
T02D3717:193b-37: de rgyu gdams ngag thob pa'o //
T02D3717:193b-38: de rgyu 'jug pa la sogs pa //
T02D3717:193b-39: de rgyu snying rje chen po yin //
T02D3717:193b-40: gang zhig shes rab snying rje med //
T02D3717:193b-41: theg pa dman pa spang bar bya //
T02D3717:193b-42: shes rab snying rje cha ldan pa //
T02D3717:193b-43: theg pa che ste gzung bar bya //
T02D3717:193b-44: sbyir na theg pa gnyis med do //
T02D3717:193b-45: sems dang sems byung khyad par ro //
T02D3717:193b-46: gang zhig shes rab snying rje med //
T02D3717:193b-47: sdom dang dam tshig la ma gnas //
T02D3717:193b-48: 'jug dang dbang bskur ma thob la //
T02D3717:194a-2: de bzhin dbang bskur med pa dang //
T02D3717:194a-3: dbang bskur dman de mi gnas pas //
T02D3717:194a-4: las rnams mkhas kyang mi bya ste //
T02D3717:194a-6: de bas sdom gnas dbang thob ni //
T02D3717:194a-7: gces par sangs rgyas kun dag dang //
T02D3717:194a-8: bla ma kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02D3717:194a-9: dad sogs ldan rnams shes par mdzod //
T02D3717:194a-10: theg pa chen po'i lam gyi rim pa las sngags
T02D3717:194a-11: kyi lam gyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'ur phye ba
T02D3717:194a-13: / bdag gis dad sogs snod ldan phyir //
T02D3717:194a-14: theg chen lam rim mdor bsdus byas //
T02D3717:194a-15: 'di yi bsod nams gang yin pas //
T02D3717:194a-16: kun gyis byang chub thob par shog / theg pa
T02D3717:194a-17: chen po lam gyi rim pa zhes bya ba slob
T02D3717:194a-18: dpon skal ba bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya bas
T02D3717:194a-21: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
